TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void BookmarkNavigationEventHandler(object sender, BookmarkNavigationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed BookmarkNavigationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.BookmarkNavigation> event of a <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer>.
Docs.remarks: ## Remarks For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
